Swedish Film Screening May 5

What Eggsactly is the Story About Egg Safety

The media thrives on hype and its latest target is the egg, a low calorie, inexpensive, source of protein and hard-to-get nutrients.* It is now being blamed for heart attacks and premature death.

Masquerade Ball at French Embassy April 13

In 1393 Charles VI of France held the first masquerade ball. Since then the Masquerade Ball has been a part of Europe’s carnival season. Less high society and more cirque du célébration, villagers would gather in masks and costumes to take part in elaborate pageants and glamorous processions.
